data.name: Adress
data.description:
## What Is Adress(ADDR)?
The Adress(ADDR) platform aims to provide easy address input and change service. It aims to provide a service that makes it easy to enter one's address on platforms such as shopping sites, and provide a blockchain ecosystem that rewards users with Adress (ADDR) tokens when transactions such as address input and address change occur.

#### What Makes Adress(ADDR) Unique?
In the future, the address input method on the website (app) will be changed to a convenient method that allows only clicking the Adress (ADDR) button.

When entering address such as delivery address

* Enter the subdivided address directly into multiple input windows (most global sites) or
* We solve the hassle of entering a search word, selecting the searched address, and entering the detailed address directly (Korean site).

Adress (ADDR) aims to help members enter addresses and change addresses easily and quickly and accurately in large shopping malls (Amazon, eBay, etc.), independent shopping mall providers (Wicks, WooCommerce, etc.), and government websites. Members can be rewarded for such actions.


#### Related Pages:
Token timeline: http://eng.addrcoin.io/token-timeline/
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k1dCplA59x0&t=13s


## How Many ADDR Coins Are There in Circulation?
The maximum supply of ADDR is 999.4 million on November 27, 2020. Excluding the locked-up volume of 994 million, the circulation is 5.4 million.

### Where Can I Buy Adress(ADDR)?
Currently, it is traded on [Foblgatel] (https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/foblgate/) and [Probit] (https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/probit-exchange/).
